content: **this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the ad-free printable pdf above ** the little textures beanie makes the cutest little newborn beanie make it solid for awesome texture and pop or multicolored for a completely different look the possibilities are endless with this hat **what s included ** 4 page printable pdf download written instructions for newborn size 12-14 head circumference link to full pattern video tutorial **pattern difficulty ** beginner **construction ** hat is worked from the top down yarn 30-50 yards wecrochet brava worsted #4 or comparable worsted weight yarn **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/s-dcnma-i0q si=lhnz7-_tvqtwwumx 1 **use coupon code crochetlove at checkout to get 30% off your pattern purchase of $10 or more cannot be combined with any other sale or code ** all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 3 ** you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //youtu be/s-dcnma-i0q si=lhnz7-_tvqtwwumx 2 https //youtu be/s-dcnma-i0q 3 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
